attributes.action: England to follow Scotland and Wales by cancelling all GCSEs and A-level exams.
attributes.background: Many students as well as teachers feel as though they have lost out on so much learning time, the extension the government have given is not sufficient and is affecting students mental health. They feel as though they don’t have enough time to get through all the content for their exams.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition:

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
